mapper.select: select no, to_char(adate, 'YYYYMMDD') as adate, todaytotaluser, totaluser from todayuser
select no, to_char(adate, 'YYYYMMDD') as adate, todaytotaluser, totaluser from todayuser where adate = to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')
select no, to_char(adate, 'YYYYMMDD') as adate, todaytotaluser, totaluser from (select * from todayuser order by no desc) where rownum = 1
mapper.insert: insert into todayuser(no, adate, todaytotaluser, totaluser) values(todayuser_seq.nextval, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, (select totaluser from todayuser where no=(select no from (select no from todayuser order by no desc) where rownum = 1))+1)
mapper.update: update todayuser set todayTotalUser= NVL(todayTotalUser, 0)+1 where adate = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD')
update todayuser set totalUser= NVL(totalUser, 0)+1 where adate = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD')
